column2: ENGLISH
Military Campaign
Conduct military operations against an enemy state. If successful, we will capture their leader, allowing our leaders to negotiate peace from a position of strength.
Operation [Actor.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]
Military Victory

This character has recently won a major military victory, and as such is respected and admired by both their superiors and the soldiers under their command. They are given great respect, and their orders are trusted without question.
Military Disaster

This character is still dealing with the legacy of a notorious military disaster suffered under their command, causing subordinates and superiors alike to constantly question their orders and ability.
[From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName] has successfully completed a military campaign and captured one of your enemies!
Well done, [From.GetTitle].
[From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName] has ordered a strategic withdrawal from one of [From.GetHerHis] military campaigns against your enemies.
Do I have to do everything myself?
[From.GetTitle] [From.GetFullName] has suffered a humilitating defeat in the field, and abandoned one of [From.GetHerHis] military campaigns against your enemies.
I'm surrounded by IDIOTS!
Conducted Successful Military Campaign
Conducted Failed Military Campaign
Dreadnoughts
Dreadnought Attack
Dreadnought Defense
Dreadnought Crew Morale
I-42 Fighter Wing
Fanatics Fighter Wing
B-2 Bomber Wing
Fanatics Bomber Wing
X1 Combat Drone Cluster
Perseus-class Destroyer
Perseus-class Destroyer
Yamato-class Battlecruiser
Victory-class Dreadnought

You currently hold command of a military office, but you are a civilian, and have neither the training nor the experience to command field units. You will have to either give command to someone more qualified, or dissolve the military.
Who's the most qualified officer I can trust?
Command will go to our brightest strategic mind.
If I can't command the military, nobody will!

Your command is currently organized as multiple separate fleets, which is causing no end of logistical and organizational nightmares for your staff. Either command of one fleet will have to be given to a subordinate, or the fleets must be merged.
A little nepotism never hurt anyone.
Who is my most qualified subordinate?
I'll have to set up a merged fleet command.
Open Military Offices Menu
Opens a menu allowing you to assign Navy and Fleet titles to the military officers under your command.
Close Military Offices Menu
Hides the Military Office decisions to clear up space in your decision list.
Give [This.GetTitle] [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] Command of the Terran Navy
The Terran Navy lacks an autonomous commander. [This.GetFullName], currently serving as [This.GetTitle] of the [This.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], would make a fine candidate.
[Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFullName] has given you command of the Terran Navy!
